name: hr_payroll
description: * Minor fix to SSS Loans -> Now can add/edit and search payments.  * Added charts to dashboard. * Reworked employee listings. Now added photo and added more useful information. * Minor design fix on employee sidebar.  * Added detailed view option on payroll * Added payroll history * Reworked requirements code to be more readable. * Loans are now ported on every employee profile for easier lookup and management.
